item.title: Getting to Grips With Time Crystals. What is That Really?
item.description: You may or may not have heard that there’s a new phase of matter been discovered and it’s called a time crystal. A team of UC Berkley physicists made the discovery last year and since t… Source: Getting to Grips With Time Crystals. What is That Really? | TrendinTech
